Title: Mr. and Mrs. Iyer
Writer: Aparna Sen (story), Dulal Dey (story), Aparna Sen
Actors: Rahul Bose, Konkona Sen Sharma, Bhisham Sahni, Surekha Sikri
Plot: During a bus journey, a devout Hindu Brahmin woman protects a Muslim man when communal rioting breaks out.
Language: English, Tamil, Bengali, Hindi, Punjabi, Urdu
